# vapor

<!-- Generated by swift-argument-parser -->

Vapor Toolbox (Server-side Swift web framework)

```
vapor [--help]
```

**--help:**

*Show help information.*


## vapor.new

Generates a new app.

```
vapor new <name> [--template=<url>] [--branch=<branch>] [--manifest=<file>] [--output=<path>] [--no-commit] [--no-git] [--yes] [--no] [--verbose]  [--help]
```

**name:**

*Name of project and folder.*


**--template=\<url\>:**

*The URL of a Git repository to use as a template.*


**--branch=\<branch\>:**

*Template repository branch to use.*


**--manifest=\<file\>:**

*The path of the manifest file. Defaults to `manifest.yml`.*


**--output=\<path\>:**

*The directory to place the new project in.*


**--no-commit:**

*Skips adding a first commit to the newly created repo.*


**--no-git:**

*Skips adding a Git repository to the project folder.*


**--yes:**

*Automatically answer yes or no to all questions.*


**--no:**

*Automatically answer yes or no to all questions.*


**--verbose:**

*Prints additional information.*


**--help:**

*Show help information.*




## vapor.help

Show subcommand help information.

```
vapor help [<subcommands>...] 
```

**subcommands:**
